meanings: Noun (약·화장품 등으로 사용하기 위한) 조제용 물질

vlive.korean: 라이브 준비 시간이 만료되어... - 홈으로 이동합니다? The preparation time is up for this live. - Redirecting to Home...? 듣기 View video NCT : 천지의 고민상담소
vlive.english: The preparation time is up for this live. - Redirecting to Home...?

vlive.korean: 준비 자세 좋아요 - 좋죠? Great preparation position. - Right? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 게임을 시작해보길 "바람"🤹‍♂️
[모든 준비는 끝났다] 스탠바이! [Preparation is comeplete] Stand by! 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : [3회] '세계 최고의 흥행 프로듀서' 엘에이리드(L.A.Reid)의 등장!

[누나... 당신은... 준비의 여왕] 제로야, 어떻게 생각해? [You.. You're the queen of preparation] ZERO, how do you think? 듣기 View video 펫셔니스타 탱구 - SM CCC LAB : [펫셔니스타 탱구┃Petionista Taengoo] EP.03 숨겨진 세상으로 part 2 (into the LA ②)
vlive.english: [You.. You're the queen of preparation] ZERO, how do you think?

vlive.korean: 네 - 윤호 씨는 뭐 또 준비하면서 뭐 하고 싶은 말 없었어요? Yes. - Yun Ho, anything you want to talk about our preparation? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 새해부터 에이티니에게 받은 고마운 선물❤️
vlive.english: Yes. - Yun Ho, anything you want to talk about our preparation?

examples.korean: Preparation 듣기 Add to Wordbook 조리법 TIMES CORE
The importance of preparation cannot be overemphasized. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 준비의 중요성은 아무리 강조해도 지나치지 않다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The importance of preparation cannot be overemphasized. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Preparation for the party started early. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 파티 준비는 일찍 시작되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Preparation for the party started early. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Some forethought and preparation is necessary before you embark on the project. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사업에 착수하기 전에 약간의 사전 숙고와 준비가 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Some forethought and preparation is necessary before you embark on the project. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Careful preparation for the exam is essential. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 세심한 시험 대비가 필수적이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Careful preparation for the exam is essential. Add to Wordbook
